Title: Enables taxpayers to donate money towards horse retirement and rescue programs; directs the commissioner of agriculture and markets to compile a list of approved horse retirement and rescue programs
Summary: Enables certain taxpayers to donate money towards horse retirement and rescue programs by providing a tax check-off box; establishes the gift for the New York state horse retirement and rescue fund; directs the commissioner of agriculture and markets to compile a list of approved horse retirement and rescue programs.
LawCode: Add §§209-Q & 625-b, Tax L; add §95-l, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to enabling certain taxpayers to donate money towards horse retirement and rescue programs; and directing the commissioner of agriculture and markets to compile a list of approved horse retirement and rescue programs
